alert.note: Alert for Laclede; Webster; Wright (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 15 at 4:25PM CDT until April 15 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN WEBSTER...NORTHWESTERN WRIGHT AND SOUTHERN LACLEDE COUNTIES... At 424 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Conway, or 11 miles northeast of Marshfield, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public reported half dollar size hail in Elkland. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Morgan... Conway... Phillipsburg... Twin Bridges... Competition... Rader... Lynchburg... Dry Knob... Falcon... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 105 and 109, and between mile markers 112 and 121. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
